string.text: Vy ŭpeŭnieny, što žadajecie pabudavać svoj horad tut?
Horad hulca byŭ stvorany ŭ paźniejšym zachavańni. Staryje zachavańni nie padtrylivajucca i mohuć pryvieści da paškodžańnia zachavańniaŭ albo pryvidnamu horadu.
Vy ŭpeŭnieny, što žadajecie pabudavać svaju viosku tut?
Vy ŭpeŭnieny, što žadajecie pabudavać svoj zamak tut?
Abiarycie sielišča, ź jakim vioska budzie źviazanaja
Ja žadaju razhladzieć varyjanty budaŭnictva sielišča.

Sielišča Hulca sutyknułasia z paškodžanym šabłonam.{newline}Kali łaska, zrabicie skrynšot i prymacujcie jaho da fajłu łohaŭ, jaki znachodzicca {LOG_PATH}. {newline}{ERROR_DETAIL}{newline}{newline}Ciapier u vašaj hulni budzie stvorana novaje avaryjnaje zachavańnie, kab paźbiehnuć zbojaŭ. Nastojliva raicca, zakryć hulniu pierad zahruzkaj.
Choose your gate position. \r{newline}Press {HELP_KEY} for help. \r{newline}Click {MOUSE_CLICK} anywhere to apply or press {ESC_KEY} to go back to settlement placement.

Choose your settlement. \r{newline}Press {HELP_KEY} for help. \r{newline}Click {MOUSE_CLICK} anywhere to apply or press {ESC_KEY} to cancel. \r{newline}Use {DEEP_EDIT_KEY} to switch to deep edit mode. \r{newline}Use {CYCLE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {CYCLE_BACK_KEY} / {CYCLE_NEXT_KEY} to change visual options.\r{newline}Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {ROTATE_BACK_KEY} / {ROTATE_NEXT_KEY} to change rotation. \r{newline}Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {ROTATE_FORWARD_KEY} / {ROTATE_BACKWARD_KEY} to change forward rotation. \r{newline}Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} + {ROTATE_MODIFIER_ALTERNATE} and {ROTATE_FORWARD_KEY} / {ROTATE_BACKWARD_KEY} to change axis rotation. \r{newline}Use {SCALE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {SCALE_BACK_KEY} / {SCALE_NEXT_KEY} to change scale. \r{newline}Use {CYCLE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {MOVE_UP_KEY} / {MOVE_DOWN_KEY} to move up or down.

Press {HELP_KEY} for help. \r{newline}Press {APPLY_KEY} to apply or press {ESC_KEY} to cancel. \r{newline}Use {DEEP_EDIT_KEY} to switch from deep edit mode to placement mode. \r{newline}Use {CYCLE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {CYCLE_BACK_KEY} / {CYCLE_NEXT_KEY} to change selected sub model.\r{newline}Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {MOUSE_CLICK} to reposition. \r{newline}Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {ROTATE_BACK_KEY} / {ROTATE_NEXT_KEY} to change rotation. \r{newline}Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {ROTATE_FORWARD_KEY} / {ROTATE_BACKWARD_KEY} to change forward rotation. \r{newline}Use {ROTATE_MODIFIER_KEY} + {ROTATE_MODIFIER_ALTERNATE} and {ROTATE_FORWARD_KEY} / {ROTATE_BACKWARD_KEY} to change axis rotation. \r{newline}Use {SCALE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {SCALE_BACK_KEY} / {SCALE_NEXT_KEY} to change scale. \r{newline}Use {CYCLE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {MOVE_UP_KEY} / {MOVE_DOWN_KEY} to move up or down. \r{newline}Use {DELETE_KEY} to delete selection. \r{newline}Use {UNDELETE_MODIFIER_KEY} and {DELETE_KEY} to un-delete previous deletion.
